description: Many flourless cakes are dense and rich, but this recipe has light, fudge-like results. Definitely one for chocolate lovers - for all-out flavour it combines chocolate and cocoa in the cake, and drizzled chocolate on top.
name: Flourless Chocolate & Almond Bundts Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Serve the cooled bundt cakes with the melted chocolate drizzled over the top. You can store the bundt cakes, without stopping, in an airtight container for 2-3 days.
